page.title: 11GHOSTS OF THE AREA
page.content: The ghosts of Turnastone and St Margarets are few and far between. Most of the area is shrouded in local superstition which are just stories handed down over the years. Of all the ghosts there are a few that have been seen or heard such as the stage-coach which runs past Peterchurch and into Turnastone. The Abbey at Abbey Dore is haunted by a monk who was killed for being kindly towards the local people. A Roman legion is supposed to march down 'Long Lane' which is why it is so straight.
